body:
Comment 3: 
The server does set the transfer encoding to "chunked".  The OP reports that he sees
"identity" because the tool that he used to examine the headers is faulty.  See the
discussion in Google Groups for more info.

Because the Go HTTP server manages transfer encoding, the application should not set the
transfer encoding header or attempt to manage transfer encoding on its own. If anything,
the Go HTTP server should return an error to the application.
